title: Lowelifes Trail Crew Lily Corduroy Cap
content:
Los Angeles-based Lowelifes Trail Crew is back with another native plant cap! This black corduroy cap was sewn in Los Angeles and features a Humboldt’s Lily, Lilium humboldtii, design from stalwart trail volunteer and artist Rachelle! Classic cotton corduroy provides a bit of warmth for your dome during the cooler months.

You can catch a glimpse of the rare, native Humboldt’s Lily (Lilium humboldtii) in some of the wetter drainages in the San Gabriel Mountains.

Sales benefit the Lowelifes‘ volunteer trail work efforts in the Angeles National Forest. Pick one up at Lowelifes.

The post Lowelifes Trail Crew Lily Corduroy Cap appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
